name: Roadkill
body:
* [Report Bugs](https://bitbucket.org/mrshrinkray/roadkill/issues)
* [Forum/suggestions](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/roadkillwiki)
* [View the current build status](https://roadkill.atlassian.net/builds/browse/ROADKILL-ROADKILL)
* [Trello/scrum board](https://trello.com/board/roadkill/50fd8e65514904981d000167)

# Introduction

Roadkill .NET is a lightweight but powerful Wiki engine built on the following foundations:

* .NET 4.0
* jQuery
* ASP.NET MVC 3 with Razor
* Lucene.net search engine
* Creole, Media Wiki and Markdown syntax support
* Bootstrap-based UI.
* Supports SQL Server, SQL Server CE, Sqlite, MySQL, Postgres, MongoDB
* It's themeable, well documented, supports Active Directory authentication and is (I hope) extremely easy to use. It's Free Open Source (FOSS)

Roadkill comes with a Screwturn import tool (Settings->Tools). This imports all pages, history, categories/tags and images as well.

## Demo site

http://www.roadkillwiki.net

Login: editor@roadkillwiki.net
Password: password

Please note: the Codeplex issues tracker *is not* monitored.

## Contributing

Currently looking for people to contribute language files (around 500 words and short phrases), for more information please ask on the Google Groups forum.

C# contributions are also welcome, but require a fair amount of experience with NHibernate, ASP.NET MVC/Razor or jQuery/HTML (pick two).

*Please use Bitbucket to provide patches/pull requests/clones* (Codeplex is a mirror repository)

## Mini-roadmap

There are no time frames for releases, however they are generally 1-2 months apart.

*Version 1.6:*
 * Move away from NHibernate
 * Improved and more flexible site configuration
 * You tube video tag

*Version 2.0:*
 * Built using ASP.NET MVC 4/ .NET 4.5
 * REST API built using the new ASP.NET Web API
 * Mobile stylesheets
 * Plugin framework for page creation/editing events
 * Desktop/personal installation
 * Improved test coverage

## Screenshots
At http://roadkill.codeplex.com
